rule.condition: not (same(current.phase in $L.file, "Registration and Categorization")) and not (same(current.phase in $L.file, "Validation")) and not (same(current.phase in $L.file, "Abandoned")) and not (same(current.phase in $L.file, "Closure"))
rule.conditionDesc: ( Phase in CurrentRecord != "Registration and Categorization" AND Phase in CurrentRecord != "Validation" AND Phase in CurrentRecord != "Abandoned" AND Phase in CurrentRecord != "Closure")
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Phase">current.phase</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="">Registration and Categorization</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Phase">current.phase</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="">Validation</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Phase">current.phase</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="">Abandoned</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Phase">current.phase</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="">Closure</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Remediation Plan is Mandatory (when ( Phase in CurrentRecord != "Registration and Categorization" AND Phase in CurrentRecord != "Validation" AND Phase in CurrentRecord != "Abandoned" AND Phase in CurrentRecord != "Closure"))
